==History==
*This book was removed in [[0.26]].
*In [[0.17]], [[Monstrous Menagerie]] was removed from this book. 
*In [[0.14]], this book contained [[Sticks to Snakes]] and [[Ice Form]] instead of [[Summon Mana Viper]] and [[Monstrous Menagerie]].
*In [[0.9]], Book of Zoology was renamed to Book of Beasts.
